examples.example: 春天来了，田野里的蚕豆都开出了美丽的花朵。

translate.english: Spring has come, and the broad beans in the fields have all bloomed beautiful flowers.

examples.example: 我和小伙伴们一起快乐地采摘蚕豆，享受着美好的时光。

translate.english: I and my little friends picked broad beans happily together and enjoyed the wonderful time.

examples.example: 我在市场买了一些新鲜的蚕豆，准备晚上做个美味的菜肴。

translate.english: I bought some fresh broad beans in the market and am going to make a delicious dish at night.
